name: aws-lambda-critical-css
description: AWS Lambda function for critical CSS generating.

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cp index.js build && cp -r setup build && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz build && cd build && zip -rq ../wordpress_critical_css-production.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: cp -r package.json build && cd build && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production

author: Viktor Kuliebiakin <kuliebiakin@gmail.com>
